ActivateZones.title: ActivateZones
ActivateZones.summary: Restores nodes in disabled zones. This operation is available only for multi-zone Elasticsearch clusters.

AddSnapshotRepo.title: AddSnapshotRepo
AddSnapshotRepo.summary: Call the AddSnapshotRepo to create a reference repository when configuring a cross-cluster OSS repository.

CancelDeletion.title: CancelDeletion
CancelDeletion.summary: Restores an Elasticsearch cluster that is frozen after it is released.

CancelLogstashDeletion.title: CancelLogstashDeletion
CancelLogstashDeletion.summary: Restores a Logstash cluster that is frozen after it is released.

CancelTask.title: CancelTask
CancelTask.summary: Call CancelTask to cancel a data migration task.

CloseDiagnosis.title: CloseDiagnosis
CloseDiagnosis.summary: Disables the intelligent O\&M feature for an Elasticsearch cluster.

CloseHttps.title: CloseHttps
CloseHttps.summary: Call CloseHttps to close the HTTPS protocol.

CreatePipelines.title: CreatePipelines
CreatePipelines.summary: Creates a pipeline in a Logstash cluster.

CreateSnapshot.title: CreateSnapshot
CreateSnapshot.summary: Call CreateSnapshot to manually back up a cluster snapshot.

DeactivateZones.title: DeactivateZones
DeactivateZones.summary: Disables one or more zones where a multi-zone Elasticsearch cluster resides and migrates the nodes in the disabled zones to other zones.

DeleteConnectedCluster.title: DeleteConnectedCluster
DeleteConnectedCluster.summary: Call DeleteConnectedCluster to remove the interconnected instance.

DeleteDataTask.title: DeleteDataTask
DeleteDataTask.summary: You can call this operation to delete an index migration task.

DeleteInstance.title: DeleteInstance
DeleteInstance.summary: You can call this operation to release a pay-as-you-go Elasticsearch instance. After the instance is released, the physical resources of the instance is reclaimed. The data of the instance is deleted and cannot be recovered. The disks mounted to the instance nodes and the snapshots are released.

DeletePipelines.title: DeletePipelines
DeletePipelines.summary: Deletes a pipeline that is configured for a Logstash cluster.

DeleteSnapshotRepo.title: DeleteSnapshotRepo
DeleteSnapshotRepo.summary: Call DeleteSnapshotRepo to delete a cross-cluster OSS repository.

DeleteVpcEndpoint.title: DeleteVpcEndpoint
DeleteVpcEndpoint.summary: Deletes an endpoint in the VPC within the Elasticsearch service account.

DescribeAckOperator.title: DescribeAckOperator
DescribeAckOperator.summary: Queries the information of ES-operator that is installed for a specified Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster.

DescribeCollector.title: DescribeCollector
DescribeCollector.summary: Queries the detailed information of a shipper.

DescribeConnectableClusters.title: DescribeConnectableClusters
DescribeConnectableClusters.summary: Queries the Elasticsearch clusters that can be connected to a specified Elasticsearch cluster.

DescribeDiagnoseReport.title: DescribeDiagnoseReport
DescribeDiagnoseReport.summary: Queries a historical intelligent O\&M report.

DescribeDiagnosisSettings.title: DescribeDiagnosisSettings
DescribeDiagnosisSettings.summary: Call DescribeDiagnosisSettings to obtain the scenario settings of intelligent maintenance.

DescribeElasticsearchHealth.title: DescribeElasticsearchHealth
DescribeElasticsearchHealth.summary: Check the health status of the cluster and whether it is running normally.

DescribeInstance.title: DescribeInstance
DescribeInstance.summary: The name of the dictionary file.

DescribeKibanaSettings.title: DescribeKibanaSettings
DescribeKibanaSettings.summary: Get the configuration of the Kibana node for the Elasticsearch cluster.

DescribeLogstash.title: DescribeLogstash
DescribeLogstash.summary: Queries the information about a Logstash cluster.

DescribePipeline.title: DescribePipeline
DescribePipeline.summary: Queries the information about a pipeline in a Logstash cluster.

DescribePipelineManagementConfig.title: DescribePipelineManagementConfig
DescribePipelineManagementConfig.summary: Queries the management configurations of pipelines in a Logstash cluster.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Get the region information of Alibaba Cloud Elasticsearch.

DescribeSnapshotSetting.title: DescribeSnapshotSetting
DescribeSnapshotSetting.summary: Get the snapshot backup settings of the cluster, backup cycle.

DescribeXpackMonitorConfig.title: DescribeXpackMonitorConfig
DescribeXpackMonitorConfig.summary: Queries the X-Pack Monitoring configurations of a Logstash cluster.

DisableKibanaPvlNetwork.title: DisableKibanaPvlNetwork
DisableKibanaPvlNetwork.summary: Disable Private Network Access of Kibana

EstimatedLogstashRestartTime.title: EstimatedLogstashRestartTime
EstimatedLogstashRestartTime.summary: Queries the estimated time that is required to restart a Logstash cluster.

EstimatedRestartTime.title: EstimatedRestartTime
EstimatedRestartTime.summary: Queries the estimated time that is required to restart an Elasticsearch cluster.

GetClusterDataInformation.title: GetClusterDataInformation
GetClusterDataInformation.summary: Call GetClusterDataInformation to obtain the data information about the cluster.

GetOpenStoreUsage.title: GetOpenStoreUsage
GetOpenStoreUsage.summary: View the storage capacity and usage of the OpensStore instance.

GetRegionConfiguration.title: GetRegionConfiguration
GetRegionConfiguration.summary: Queries the configuration information about the current region.

GetSuggestShrinkableNodes.title: GetSuggestShrinkableNodes
GetSuggestShrinkableNodes.summary: Call GetSuggestShrinkableNodes to specify the type and number of nodes to obtain the nodes that can be removed.

GetTransferableNodes.title: GetTransferableNodes
GetTransferableNodes.summary: Call GetTransferableNodes to specify the type and number of nodes to obtain the nodes that can be migrated.

InstallAckOperator.title: InstallAckOperator
InstallAckOperator.summary: Installs ES-operator for a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster.

InstallKibanaSystemPlugin.title: InstallKibanaSystemPlugin
InstallKibanaSystemPlugin.summary: Call InstallKibanaSystemPlugin to install the Kibana plug-in. The Kibana specification must be 2-Core 4 GB or higher.

InstallSystemPlugin.title: InstallSystemPlugin
InstallSystemPlugin.summary: Call InstallSystemPlugin to install a system preset plug-in.

InstallUserPlugins.title: InstallUserPlugins
InstallUserPlugins.summary: Installs custom plug-ins that are uploaded to the Elasticsearch console.

InterruptElasticsearchTask.title: InterruptElasticsearchTask
InterruptElasticsearchTask.summary: Call InterruptElasticsearchTask to interrupt the Alibaba cloud elasticsearch instance in the change. This parameter is valid only for instances in the initializing state. When the instance is interrupted, it enters the suspended state.

InterruptLogstashTask.title: InterruptLogstashTask
InterruptLogstashTask.summary: After the task is suspended, the Logstash cluster is in the suspended state.

ListAckClusters.title: ListAckClusters
ListAckClusters.summary: Queries a list of Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) clusters.

ListAckNamespaces.title: ListAckNamespaces
ListAckNamespaces.summary: View all namespaces of the specified Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster.

ListAllNode.title: ListAllNode
ListAllNode.summary: Queries the information of all the nodes in an Elasticsearch cluster.

ListAlternativeSnapshotRepos.title: ListAlternativeSnapshotRepos
ListAlternativeSnapshotRepos.summary: Call ListAlternativeSnapshotRepos to get the OSS reference warehouses that can be added to the current instance.

ListAvailableEsInstanceIds.title: ListAvailableEsInstanceIds
ListAvailableEsInstanceIds.summary: Queries the Elasticsearch clusters that can be associated with a Logstash cluster when you configure the X-Pack Monitoring feature for the Logstash cluster.

ListConnectedClusters.title: ListConnectedClusters
ListConnectedClusters.summary: Call ListConnectedClusters to query the instances that are interconnected with the current instance.

ListDataTasks.title: ListDataTasks
ListDataTasks.summary: Call ListDataTasks to obtain the information of a data migration task.

ListDefaultCollectorConfigurations.title: ListDefaultCollectorConfigurations
ListDefaultCollectorConfigurations.summary: Queries the default configuration files of shippers.

ListDiagnoseIndices.title: ListDiagnoseIndices
ListDiagnoseIndices.summary: Queries the indexes for health diagnosis performed on an Elasticsearch cluster.

ListDiagnoseReport.title: ListDiagnoseReport
ListDiagnoseReport.summary: Queries the historical intelligent O\&M reports of an Elasticsearch cluster.

ListDiagnoseReportIds.title: ListDiagnoseReportIds
ListDiagnoseReportIds.summary: Queries the IDs of the historical intelligent O\\\&M reports of an Elasticsearch cluster.

ListDiagnosisItems.title: ListDiagnosisItems
ListDiagnosisItems.summary: Queries the intelligent diagnostic items of an Elasticsearch cluster.

ListDicts.title: ListDicts
ListDicts.summary: Queries the details of a specified type of dictionary.

ListEcsInstances.title: ListEcsInstances
ListEcsInstances.summary: When you create a Beats collector, call the ListEcsInstances to obtain the list of ECS instances.

ListExtendfiles.title: ListExtendfiles
ListExtendfiles.summary: Queries the extended file configuration of a Logstash instance.

ListInstance.title: ListInstance
ListInstance.summary: Queries a list of Elasticsearch clusters.

ListInstanceIndices.title: ListInstanceIndices
ListInstanceIndices.summary: Queries the indexes stored on an Elasticsearch cluster.

ListKibanaPlugins.title: ListKibanaPlugins
ListKibanaPlugins.summary: Queries a list of Kibana plug-ins.

ListLogstash.title: ListLogstash
ListLogstash.summary: Queries the information about a Logstash cluster or all Logstash clusters.

ListLogstashLog.title: ListLogstashLog
ListLogstashLog.summary: Queries the logs of a Logstash cluster.

ListLogstashPlugins.title: ListLogstashPlugins
ListLogstashPlugins.summary: Queries the information about a plug-in or all plug-ins.

ListNodes.title: ListNodes
ListNodes.summary: The list of historical reports of Intelligent Maintenance.

ListPipelineIds.title: ListPipelineIds
ListPipelineIds.summary: Queries the IDs of pipelines for a Logstash cluster.

ListPlugins.title: ListPlugins
ListPlugins.summary: Queries the plug-ins that are installed on a specified Elasticsearch cluster.

ListSearchLog.title: ListSearchLog
ListSearchLog.summary: Queries the logs of an Elasticsearch cluster.

ListShardRecoveries.title: ListShardRecoveries
ListShardRecoveries.summary: Queries the information about shards that are being restored or shards that are restored. By default, this operation returns only the information about shards that are being restored after you call this operation.

ListSnapshotReposByInstanceId.title: ListSnapshotReposByInstanceId
ListSnapshotReposByInstanceId.summary: Call the ListSnapshotReposByInstanceId to get the cross-cluster OSS repositories of the current instance.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are added to one or more resources.

ListTags.title: ListTags
ListTags.summary: All tags created by the user in the current region.

ListVpcEndpoints.title: ListVpcEndpoints
ListVpcEndpoints.summary: Queries the statuses of endpoints in the virtual private cloud (VPC) within the Elasticsearch service account.

MigrateToOtherZone.title: MigrateToOtherZone
MigrateToOtherZone.summary: Call the MigrateToOtherZone to migrate the nodes in the specified zone to the destination zone.

ModifyDeployMachine.title: ModifyDeployMachine
ModifyDeployMachine.summary: Changes the Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances on which a shipper is installed.

ModifyInstanceMaintainTime.title: ModifyInstanceMaintainTime
ModifyInstanceMaintainTime.summary: Enables and modifies the maintenance window of an Elasticsearch cluster.

ModifyWhiteIps.title: ModifyWhiteIps
ModifyWhiteIps.summary: Updates an IP address whitelist of an Elasticsearch cluster.

MoveResourceGroup.title: MoveResourceGroup
MoveResourceGroup.summary: Migrates an Elasticsearch cluster to a specified resource group.

OpenDiagnosis.title: OpenDiagnosis
OpenDiagnosis.summary: Enables the intelligent O\\\&M feature for an instance.

OpenHttps.title: OpenHttps
OpenHttps.summary: Call OpenHttps to enable the HTTPS protocol. Make sure that you have purchased a client node before enabling this feature.

ReinstallCollector.title: ReinstallCollector
ReinstallCollector.summary: Installs a shipper that failed to be installed when you create the shipper.

RenewInstance.title: RenewInstance
RenewInstance.summary: Call RenewInstance to renew a subscription instance.

RestartInstance.title: RestartInstance
RestartInstance.summary: You can call this operation to restart a specified Elasticsearch instance.

RestartLogstash.title: RestartLogstash
RestartLogstash.summary: Restarts a specified Logstash cluster. After the cluster is restarted, it is in the activating state.

ResumeElasticsearchTask.title: ResumeElasticsearchTask
ResumeElasticsearchTask.summary: Call ResumeElasticsearchTask to resume interrupted change of Elasticsearch instance. After you resume or interrupt a change, the instance enters the activating state.

ResumeLogstashTask.title: ResumeLogstashTask
ResumeLogstashTask.summary: Resumes a change task of a Logstash cluster. After the task is resumed, the Logstash cluster is in the activating state.

RunPipelines.title: RunPipelines
RunPipelines.summary: Runs pipelines in a Logstash cluster.

ShrinkNode.title: ShrinkNode
ShrinkNode.summary: Removes nodes from an Elasticsearch cluster.

StartCollector.title: StartCollector
StartCollector.summary: Starts a collector to collect data.

StopPipelines.title: StopPipelines
StopPipelines.summary: Stops pipelines in a Logstash cluster.

TransferNode.title: TransferNode
TransferNode.summary: Runs a data migration task for node scaling operations.

TriggerNetwork.title: TriggerNetwork
TriggerNetwork.summary: You can call this operation to enable or disable public or private network access for a Elasticsearch or Kibana cluster.

TurnOffZone.title: TurnOffZone
TurnOffZone.summary: Multi-zone Instance: Shutting down an existing availability zone is only for disaster recovery drills. Proceed with caution!

TurnOnZone.title: TurnOnZone
TurnOnZone.summary: Multi-zone Instance, reopening a zone that has been taken offline is only for disaster recovery drills. Please proceed with caution!

UninstallKibanaPlugin.title: UninstallKibanaPlugin
UninstallKibanaPlugin.summary: Call the UninstallKibanaPlugin to uninstall the Kibana plug-in.

UninstallLogstashPlugin.title: UninstallLogstashPlugin
UninstallLogstashPlugin.summary: Removes one or more Logstash plug-ins.

UninstallPlugin.title: UninstallPlugin
UninstallPlugin.summary: Call UninstallPlugin to uninstall the preset plug-in.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Deletes a user resource tag relationship.

UpdateAdminPassword.title: UpdateAdminPassword
UpdateAdminPassword.summary: You can call this operation to UpdateAdminPassword the password of the elastic account of the specified Elasticsearch instance.

UpdateAdvancedSetting.title: UpdateAdvancedSetting
UpdateAdvancedSetting.summary: Call UpdateAdvancedSetting to change the garbage collector configuration for the specified instance.

UpdateAliwsDict.title: UpdateAliwsDict
UpdateAliwsDict.summary: Updates the dictionary file of the analysis-aliws plug-in.

UpdateCollector.title: UpdateCollector
UpdateCollector.summary: Updates the configurations of a shipper.

UpdateCollectorName.title: UpdateCollectorName
UpdateCollectorName.summary: Changes the name of a shipper.

UpdateDescription.title: UpdateDescription
UpdateDescription.summary: Changes the name of a specified Elasticsearch cluster.

UpdateDiagnosisSettings.title: UpdateDiagnosisSettings
UpdateDiagnosisSettings.summary: Call UpdateDiagnosisSettings to update the instance of intelligent operation\&maintenance (O\&M) scene settings.

UpdateDict.title: UpdateDict
UpdateDict.summary: Updates a dictionary of an Elasticsearch cluster.

UpdateExtendfiles.title: UpdateExtendfiles
UpdateExtendfiles.summary: Updates the driver files of a Logstash cluster.

UpdateInstance.title: UpdateInstance
UpdateInstance.summary: Updates the configurations of a cluster, such as the number of nodes, the number of roles, specifications, and disk configurations.

UpdateInstanceSettings.title: UpdateInstanceSettings
UpdateInstanceSettings.summary: Call UpdateInstanceSettings to update the YML configuration of a specified instance.

UpdateKibanaSettings.title: UpdateKibanaSettings
UpdateKibanaSettings.summary: Call UpdateKibanaSettings to modify the Kibana configuration. Currently, you can only modify the Kibana language configuration.

UpdateKibanaWhiteIps.title: UpdateKibanaWhiteIps
UpdateKibanaWhiteIps.summary: Updates an IP address whitelist for access to the Kibana console of a specified Elasticsearch cluster.

UpdateLogstash.title: UpdateLogstash
UpdateLogstash.summary: Modifies the configuration of a specified Logstash cluster, such as the name, quota, disk size, and number of nodes.

UpdateLogstashChargeType.title: UpdateLogstashChargeType
UpdateLogstashChargeType.summary: Switches the billing method of a Logstash cluster from pay-as-you-go to subscription.

UpdateLogstashDescription.title: UpdateLogstashDescription
UpdateLogstashDescription.summary: Changes the name of a specified Logstash cluster.

UpdateLogstashSettings.title: UpdateLogstashSettings
UpdateLogstashSettings.summary: Updates the configuration of the specified Logstash instance.

UpdatePipelineManagementConfig.title: UpdatePipelineManagementConfig
UpdatePipelineManagementConfig.summary: Modifies the pipeline management method of the specified Logstash cluster.

UpdatePipelines.title: UpdatePipelines
UpdatePipelines.summary: Updates a pipeline of a Logstash cluster.

UpdatePrivateNetworkWhiteIps.title: UpdatePrivateNetworkWhiteIps
UpdatePrivateNetworkWhiteIps.summary: You can call this operation to update the VPC private network access whitelist of a specified Elasticsearch instance UpdatePrivateNetworkWhiteIps.

UpdateSnapshotSetting.title: UpdateSnapshotSetting
UpdateSnapshotSetting.summary: Call UpdateSnapshotSetting to update the data backup configuration of the specified instance.

UpdateSynonymsDicts.title: UpdateSynonymsDicts
UpdateSynonymsDicts.summary: Updates the synonym dictionaries of an Elasticsearch cluster.

UpdateWhiteIps.title: UpdateWhiteIps
UpdateWhiteIps.summary: Updates a private IP address whitelist of an Elasticsearch cluster.

UpdateXpackMonitorConfig.title: UpdateXpackMonitorConfig
UpdateXpackMonitorConfig.summary: Updates the X-Pack monitoring and alert configuration of a Logstash cluster.

UpgradeEngineVersion.title: UpgradeEngineVersion
UpgradeEngineVersion.summary: Upgrades the version or kernel of an Elasticsearch cluster.

ValidateConnection.title: ValidateConnection
ValidateConnection.summary: Tests the connectivity between a Logstash cluster and its associated Elasticsearch cluster when you configure the X-Pack Monitoring feature for the Logstash cluster.

ValidateShrinkNodes.summary: Checks whether specific nodes can be removed from a specified Elasticsearch cluster.

ValidateSlrPermission.title: ValidateSlrPermission
ValidateSlrPermission.summary: Verify the SLR permissions of the current account.

ValidateTransferableNodes.title: ValidateTransferableNodes
ValidateTransferableNodes.summary: Checks whether the data on specific nodes in a specified Elasticsearch cluster can be migrated.
